HotelElement.Name: Avonmore On The Park Boutique Hotel

Description.Text: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Randwick, Avonmore on The Park Boutique Hotel promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, fax machine, facilities for disabled guests, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage are readily available for you to enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating, desk, mini bar to ensure a restful night. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include golf course (within 3 km), garden. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Sydney has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Avonmore on The Park Boutique Hotel.
